field.name: $viewerProjectTags
field.viewer: To Invoice{{$fmt('$toInvoiceCounter')}} Project Project phase Business

field.name: clientPartner
field.domain: self.isCustomer = true AND :company member of self.companySet

field.name: customerAddress
field.domain: self IN (SELECT address FROM PartnerAddress where partner = :clientPartner)

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.isProject = true AND self.projectTypeSelect = 1 AND self.id != :id"

action-view.name: action-project-view-phase
action-view.title: Project phase
action-view.domain: self.isProject = true and self.projectTypeSelect = :_xProjectTypeSelect and self.parentProject.id = :_parentId

action-view.name: action-project-view-phase-new
action-view.title: Project phase
action-view.domain: self.isProject = true and self.projectTypeSelect = :_xProjectTypeSelect and self.parentProject.id = :_parentProjectId

action-view.name: action-project-view-phase-all
action-view.title: Project phases
action-view.domain: self.isProject = true and self.projectTypeSelect = :_xProjectTypeSelect and self.parentProject.id = :_parentProjectId

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.isContact = true AND :company member of self.companySet"
